main event: On 13 March 1953, several unidentified objects were sighted in the sky over Tehran, Iran. The objects were tracked on radar and engaged by Iranian Air Force fighter jets. The incident lasted several hours and involved multiple sightings and encounters with the unknown objects.
interesting points: Multiple sightings were reported over several hours,The objects were tracked on military radar,Engagement by Iranian Air Force fighter jets occurred,The objects displayed unusual maneuverability and luminosity,Reports of foreign aircraft overflights were considered during investigations.
witness description: Control tower operators, Iranian Air Force pilots, and military personnel
